title: Social Media Moderator – WFH (Earn Up to PHP 25,000!)
job_overview:
Perfect for Beginners! Work from Home & Earn Big!

Do you love scrolling through Facebook, Instagram, or TikTok? Turn your hobby into a high-paying WFH job! We need Social Media Moderators to engage with users and manage online content.

? Your Role:

Monitor comments, messages, and posts on social media

Report issues and interact with followers professionally

Assist in basic social media marketing (no experience? We train you!)

? What We Need:

Basic computer/mobile knowledge (you know how to browse & type!)

Familiar with Facebook, Instagram, TikTok, or YouTube

Can commit to 5 mins of response time every 20 mins

???? Earn PHP 18,000 – 25,000/month + performance bonuses!
???? 100% Remote – Work in your PJs!
???? Free paid training – Start ASAP!

Click "Apply Now" – Limited slots available!
